name: 1-bit Rush
description:
Retro turn-based racing game! 
How To Play

The goal is simply to cross the finish line using as few turns as possible.

There are two gameplay phases.

The first one is the adjustment phase, where you will be able to adjust the trajectory of your car by using your keyboard arrows. 

The second phase is the movement phase. During this phase, your car will follow the trajectory that you set in the first phase and begin moving across the track. 

Controls 
  • Up Arrow : Throttle
  • Down Arrow : Brake
  • Right/Left Arrows : Steering
  • Space : Validate (go to movement phase) 
Disclamer

Please note that it's just an early prototype, so there may be some bugs and unfinished features. 

I'm working on it solo and would really appreciate any feedback you have. If you have any suggestions or ideas for improvements, please let me know. Your input will be a huge help as I continue to develop the game. 

Thanks for playing !
